{"title": "Don't Feed the Trolls", "title_search": "dont feed the trolls", "title_keyword": "dont feed the trolls", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/dont-feed-the-trolls/", "summary": "You will need sharp reflexes to feed the bears while avoiding the trolls getting in your way. Don’t get scared and chase the trolls away with huge slaps! Using intuitive gestures (tap to feed, swipe to slap), Don’t Feed the Trolls brings you four different game modes:- Classic: You have 40 seconds to get the three stars in each level. You will then unlock more levels and progressively discover new characters.- Time Attack: 100 bears appear and you must feed them as fast as possible. Tip: to reach high scores, use both hands!- Slap Party: A lot of trolls appear in waves, faster and faster. You need to slap them all!- Versus (two players) On the split screen, you must feed your bears before your opponent to win the round.FEATURES? Accessible gameplay: Tap to feed the bears, swipe to slap the trolls? Many characters: - Speedy bear: feed him quickly - Hungry bear: feed him twice - Sneaky troll: don’t get fooled by his bear mask - Skeleton bear - King troll - And much more...? Achievements? Leaderboards for each game mode? Game Center enabled###If you like it, please rate it!If you have any issue or you want to suggest anything, please contact us!###Web : www.frozax.com/games/dont-feed-the-trollsTwitter: http://twitter.com/frozaxFacebook : http://www.facebook.com/frozax", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2011-09-23", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-207386-52.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-207386-52.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": null, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Frozax Games (Developer)", "Frozax Games (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["Xbox 360", "iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Mortimer Beckett and the Crimson Thief", "title_search": "mortimer beckett and the crimson thief", "title_keyword": "mortimer beckett and the crimson thief", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/mortimer-beckett-and-the-crimson-thief/", "summary": "Finally home after his astounding journey, Mortimer resumes his simple life and peruses the daily newspaper. One by one, famous artifacts from museums and private collections around the world are missing. The person claiming responsibility for the thefts goes by the moniker - the Crimson Thief, a ghost that the police can do nothing about. Mortimer however, jumps on the case and is determined find the stolen goods while bringing the thief to justice. Follow Mortimer around the world to recover the stolen items. Visit Paris, Rio, London, and other fabulous destinations where you will search for useful items, solve whimsical puzzles, and meet helpful locals. There's much more to this new mystery than meets the eye. Are the artifacts connected in any way? Can Mortimer piece together the clues to finding them all? Who is the Crimson Thief?", "genre": ["Hidden Object"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2012-04-26", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-485093-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-485093-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["GameHouse (Developer)", "GameHouse (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["PC", "iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Farm Swap", "title_search": "farm swap", "title_keyword": "farm swap", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/farm-swap/", "summary": "*** 50% OFF INTRODUCTORY OFFER! LIMITED TIME ONLY! ***  Pigs, goats, chickens, sheep, turkeys, and cats - oh my!  Farm Swap is an addictive match-4 game with 3 different game modes to keep you entertained for hours. Move the unusually square farm animals - pigs, goats, sheep, chicks, turkeys, and cats - around your iPhone until they make a match of 4 of a kind in any direction. Get matches of 5 or more to create super blocks with special abilities. Squeal with excitement when the super blocks make real animals sounds!  Farm Swap is unlike any match-3 game you've played! There are no wrong moves. You can move the animals around your iPhone and set them up like dominoes to create an awesome chain reaction of matches to get the best score ever!  Choose from 3 different games modes - Farm Frenzy, Lazy Grazing, and Wild Turkey. Find your favourite or mix it up to keep you on your toes.  Facebook integration! Post your high scores to Facebook and challenge your friends!  Featured in New & Noteworthy Kids & Puzzle Games!  *3 GAME MODES* *ADORABLY SQUARE ANIMALS* *SQUEALING SUPER BLOCKS* *FACEBOOK INTEGRATION* *FARMTASTIC MUSIC* *UNLIMITED LEVELS*   3 GAME MODES Choose from 3 different game modes: *Farm Frenzy - a race against the clock to get points and level up! *Lazy Grazing - slow and strategic, choose your moooves carefully! *Wild Turkey - you have 60 seconds to get the best score ever - GO!  ADORABLY SQUARE ANIMALS Imagine what a pig would look like if you squeezed it into a box! Don't worry - it doesn't hurt!  SQUEALING SUPER BLOCKS Match 5 or more of a kind in any direction and create a SQUEALING SUPER BLOCK! The animals squeal, cluck, meow, bleat, and gobble with excitement and so will you!  FACEBOOK INTEGRATION Post your high scores to Facebook with the click of a pig-shaped button. Show off your best scores and challenge your friends to beat them!  FARMTASTIC MUSIC Get in the mood with a boot-scootin' sound track. You'll be square dancing in no time!  UNLIMITED LEVELS There is no limit to play time or the number of levels! Challenge yourself to do better each time!", "genre": ["Matching Puzzle"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-08-27", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-165136-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-165136-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Iron Helmet Games (Developer)", "Iron Helmet Games (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Pitman", "title_search": "pitman", "title_keyword": "pitman", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/pitman/", "summary": "You are Krumb, a dwarven pitman with the quest for mighty artifacts. Drink from health fountains, open treasure chests, collect a wide range of food, weapons and magical items and use them wisely - to eventually stand your ground against the perils that await you!Initially made for the "Seven Day Roguelike Challenge" the game got a complete overhaul. Pitman will let you die a thousand deaths ... and make your survival especially satisfying!Features:* RPG - create the hero you want, like a dwarven sorcerer or a powerful warrior* turnbased - for a tactical course of action* 3D boardgame style - build the world while playing* randombased - no game will be like the one before", "genre": ["RPG"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2011-05-03", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-190043-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-190043-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Rat King Entertainment (Developer)", "Rat King Entertainment (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)", "PC"], "rating": null}

{"title": "iHaggle: Hidden Treasure Street", "title_search": "ihaggle hidden treasure street", "title_keyword": "ihaggle hidden treasure street", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/ihaggle-hidden-treasure-street/", "summary": "Jam packed with over 900 items in 16 different shops and houses. If you like scavenger hunts or hidden object games, iHaggle is for you.  Slide your finger to move up and down Haggle street and then go inside the shops and houses, searching for treasures. Some are easy to find, and others are carefully hidden, making iHaggle fun for beginners to advanced hidden object game players.  When you've found all the items on your list, head to the Appraisal Shop and sell them for the best price.  Each level gets harder as the number of items to find increases.  For those seeking higher scores, you also have the option to play the Hi-Lo Challenge mini game in between each level if you want.  As you complete levels, new shops and houses open up for you to explore until you've unlocked all 16. If you repeat a level, a new list of items to search for is created each time you repeat a level until all items have been used once. With 900 items, that's a lot of repeat play value !  Shops/Houses: Appraisal Shop Nick’s Nac Shack Handy Depot George’s Curios Bahama Momma & Pops Sweaty Pete’s #6 Haggle Street (Garage Sale) #7 Haggle Street (Garage Sale) Grandma’s Drawers Holley Humbugs Dusty & Krusty Antiques Digbees Costmore JC Puney Wee Mart Bullseye Barns & Hammers", "genre": ["Hidden Object"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-08-25", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-167259-52.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-167259-52.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Motile Media (Developer)", "Motile Media (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Battle Group", "title_search": "battle group", "title_keyword": "battle group", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/battle-group/", "summary": "**iPhone 3G not supported. Black water fix submitted and will be available soon**The near future. A pirate conglomeration equipped with the latest military hardware wages an unopposed war of plunder within the vital trade routes of the world.  A naval force of modern warships drawn from a unified community of free nations is assembled to meet this growing threat. You are their commander. ****************************** TACTICAL ACTION / MODERN NAVAL WARFARE Fight off waves of air, land and sea based opponents. A simple to use control method lets you get straight into the action. USE ADVANCED ARMAMENTS Control the devastating power of modern naval weaponry including anti-air missiles, naval guns and jump jet interceptors. CUSTOMIZE YOUR FLEET Select from a diverse range of ship types including Patrol Boats, Guided Missile Frigates, Aircraft Carriers and more. UNLOCK NEW SHIPS AND SPECIAL ABILITIES A reward system for exceptional performance allows you to purchase new ship classes. Gain experience in battle to unlock abilities specific to each of these. IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Who are these pirates? What are their true motivations? And is everything as it seems? Uncover the sinister plot as told through the dialogue of veteran video gaming voice actor Bob Carter. FULL GAME CENTER INTEGRATION Earn achievements and dominate the online leaderboards. Check out your battle statistics as you progress through the your naval career. AUTHENTIC EXPERIENCE Researched and developed in consultation with actual ex-serving naval personnel. MUCH MORE COMING SOON Upcoming expansions include new ship classes, campaign missions, enemies, play modes and multiplayer.", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2011-09-28", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-210099-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-210099-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Bane Games (Publisher)", "Bane Games (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)", "PC"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Helium Boy", "title_search": "helium boy", "title_keyword": "helium boy", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/helium-boy/", "summary": "Helium Boy is an original 3D platform game for iOS, inspired by classic games like Balloon Fight and Balloon Kid. Use your helium filled balloons to fly through diverse, colorful environments and collect all the stars. Watch out for birds, ninjas and spikey things and don't fall into the water!Helium Boy features full 3D Retina graphics with a cute artstyle. 8 challenging stages, all with unique environments and different types of gameplay. Full 3D gameplay, as well as a couple of traditional sidescrolling stages. Two difficulty modes: in beginner mode you can play the stages at you own pace and easily collect all the stars, but in normal mode the screen is scrolling automatically and constantly forces you to move forward, so you have to find the perfect route to get all the stars before they leave the screen.Controls: The game uses an onscreen gamepad. Touch the directional pad to move in the character in any direction. Press the Jump button repeatedly to fly with the balloons. If the balloons pop, press the Pump button to get new ones, or jump around without them. You can also let go of the balloons at any time by pressing the Drop button.", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2011-10-07", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-210251-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-210251-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Horberg Productions (Publisher)", "Horberg Productions (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Arriving - Gravity Puzzle Game", "title_search": "arriving  gravity puzzle game", "title_keyword": "arriving  gravity puzzle game", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/arriving-gravity-puzzle-game/", "summary": "Challenge yourself with the amazing gravity puzzle game in Arriving!   Arriving is a recreational puzzle game. Just drag your finger across the screen. Draw lines and objects of arbitrary shape as in the real physics world. There are infinite solutions!  The Story of Ano  Ano is an unhatched dinosaur in ancient times. Unlike his brothers, he did not have the chance to enjoy the beautiful world. Luckily, he avoided the most annihilating disaster. Many years have passed, and Ano wakes up in his thick shell, but he does not have the power needed to break out. Just draw the objects by dragging your finger and help Ano to get all of the energy. Let's help him to start this incredible journey.  ? More levels will be added in the next version.  Features:  •Retina Display •Physics puzzle game •Simple and intuitive control •Exciting game mode •40 levels now •5 different scenes now •28 achievements for you to get •Play with your own music •Game Center •Open Feint", "genre": ["Edutainment"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-09-02", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-167159-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-167159-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["chlova (Publisher)", "chlova (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "CryptoQuip", "title_search": "cryptoquip", "title_keyword": "cryptoquip", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/cryptoquip/", "summary": "CryptoQuip is the challenging puzzle game where you decode famous quotes. The game is based on letter substitution. To solve the secret message you just drag and drop alphabet tiles onto the puzzle board. The quotes are fun and educational - whether they contain witty, wise or warm sentiments.  Our immersive game play lets you intuitively solve the puzzle with feedback features that colour the letters and show duplicate alphabet tiles as you drag. You never lose sight of the puzzle while choosing the next letter. Just in case you get stuck, there is an option to show one hint or reveal the entire puzzle.  With 100 puzzles included, CryptoQuip will keep your brain engaged for hours.", "genre": ["Logic Puzzle"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2011-04-05", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-187105-52.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-187105-52.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Surje Software Solutions Inc.
